title: Three Sisters in Black
description: The bizarre true case of the 'Bathtub Tragedy". It started when a beautiful young woman named Ocey Snead was found in a bathtub--naked and dead. — Charged with her murder were her mother, Caroline, and her two aunts, Mary and Virginia--all socially prominent southern belles. — But the investigation of the "The Bathtub Tragedy" was only the beginning, for it revealed a family history of other bizarre, violent unexplained deaths, with all the clues pointing to the mysterious 'sisters in black'...
author: Norman J. Zierold
